titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to impose certain notification requirements on the Secretary of Defense as a precondition on the establishment of Department of Defense domestic dependent elementary and secondary schools.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Readiness.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from DOD.

bill.summary: 4/15/1997--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Defense, before commencing any study or entering into any arrangement with respect to the provision at a military installation of elementary or secondary education for dependents of military personnel and civilian employees of the Department of Defense, to notify the appropriate congressional representatives, local education agency, and education department of the State, territory, or possession in which the military installation is located of the reasons why the Secretary considers such study or arrangement to be necessary.
